name: Breaking out of Control
description:
You have to eliminate the blocks by getting the paddle to hit

the ball and the ball to hit the blocks.

You eliminate one block after you hit him.

Main goal is to eliminate all blocks.

From time to time the control changes and instead of pushing
the mouse right to left you have to do it up to bottom.

Right click to shoot the ball.

Run BreakingOutOfControl.exe for the game.
